main.name: Lance Fairbairn
main.occupation: Web Designer, Programer and Sales Representative
main.bio: Years of Experience of meeting businesses and individuals needs
main.contactmessage: Please contact me for your next project on your list that needs to be completed and compomlishes your goals

resume.skillmessage:
To obtain a sale position with an outstanding company that desires to grow a territory
and allow representative to thrive in it. I will apply my professionalism, sales experience, presentation
skills to build profitable sales results, outstanding customer service and long-term relationships for this
dynamic company.
Authorized to work in the US for any employer
Ready for immediate employment

education.description: Business Administration with a focus on Managment and Marketing

work.title: Sales Representative
work.description:
Manage the largest company account. Customer had just made some major changes in supplier and
        needed someone with previous experience to manage this account.  Consulted production on design issues and coordinate
        with distribution and shipping of goods.

work.title: Owner/Operator
work.description:
Managed Personnel, oversee quality control and projects, handle customer service, set pricing structures
        and budgets, manage operations and services, create bids, territory sales and purchasing of supplies and equipment.

work.company: LaFairb Corporation - dba HOODZ of Greater Wichita Metro Area
work.title: President/Manager
work.description:
Launched and built new territory from scratch, hire and manage staff and technicians, oversee quality
         control, handle customer service, set pricing structures and budgets, manage operations and services, create bids, territory sales, handle employee hiring and evaluations

work.title: Area Sales Leader
work.description:
Consulted, advised, trained and provided exterior building products to Remodeling
        Contractors, Handyman Profession, Large Project Building Contractors and Residential
        Living. My territory covered the Wichita Metro Area, Western Kansas and most of
        Eastern Kansas except for the Greater Kansas City area and Topeka.

projects.title: Facebook Clone with React - yet to come

testimonials.text: Yet to build - Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

Yet to build - That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
